messages.content: What is the main functionality of ComfyUI-Image-Round node?
The ComfyUI-Image-Round node is designed to round an image either up (pad) or down (crop) to the nearest integer multiple.
Are there adjustable settings within the ComfyUI-Image-Round node?
Yes, the ComfyUI-Image-Round node has adjustable settings for padding offset from left/bottom and the padding value.
What is the difference between the basic ComfyUI-Image-Round node and the 'Round Image Advanced' version?
The 'Round Image Advanced' version of the ComfyUI-Image-Round node includes optional node-driven inputs and outputs, providing additional functionality.
How is the 'Round Image Advanced' node designed to be used?

The 'Round Image Advanced' node is designed to be used with an extra 'Crop Image Advanced' node, which takes the padding outputs from the 'Round Image Advanced' node and crops the image back down to the original size.
